Today in County Clare, surf is looking good with 7 ft @ 10s W swell and a moderate 14 mph W wind. Best spots include Crab Island and Doolin Point, both offering clean conditions during their respective tide windows. Tomorrow, conditions drop with a hefty 10 ft @ 14s WNW swell and fresh 22 mph SSE wind, making it poor across the board. Day after, still poor with 8 ft @ 12s WSW and 18 mph WSW wind. Best: today.
